activeProcessNames.string: Release Build Passed on all OS

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_BUILD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Flag whether or not this build is a release build candidate. If a build is a release candidate then STC_CR license/entitlement will be disabled

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAGELLAN_FRONTEND_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to magellan frontend artifact in Artifactory (https://artifactory.srv.orionprod.net)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAGELLAN_BACKEND_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to magellan backend artifact (orion-res) in Artifactory (https://artifactory.srv.orionprod.net)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ARCHANGEL_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to archangle artifact in Artifactory (https://artifactory.srv.orionprod.net)

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: del BLL_changelist_*.txt echo %P4_CHANGELIST% %JOB_NAME% %BUILD_NUMBER% > BLL_changelist_%P4_CHANGELIST%.txt python bll_cleanuptmps.py

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import urllib2 import os import base64 import json
username = 'builder' password = os.environ['AF_PASSWORD']
af_base_url = 'https://artifactory.srv.orionprod.net/artifactory/api/storage' url = af_base_url + '/' + os.environ['MAGELLAN_FRONTEND_PATH'] + '?properties' # "pattern" from AF plugin config section above
print url # -- creating request object with auth. request = urllib2.Request(url) base64string = base64.b64encode('%s:%s' % (username, password)) request.add_header("Authorization", "Basic %s" % base64string)
# -- Open url and process json output result = urllib2.urlopen(request) props = json.loads(result.read()) magellan_fe_build = props['properties']['build.number'][0]
print "Magellan FrontEnd build number: " + magellan_fe_build

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
echo P4CHANGESTART %P4_CHANGELIST% P4CHANGEEND genSln.bat
scons.cmd -v rd /s /q bin\Release\STAKCommands exit /B 0

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
# update ILVersion.xml file as this is needed by NTAF import os import sys import subprocess import optparse import glob import shutil import re
stc_maj_min_ver=os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] print "\nIN:_run_update_ilversion_xml" ilversion_xml_path = os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], 'framework', 'bll', 'core', 'install', 'release', 'ILVersion.xml') tmpfile = ilversion_xml_path + ".new" print "ILVerson.xml path: ", ilversion_xml_path
ilbuildnumber = '0000'
f1 = open(ilversion_xml_path, 'r') f2 = open('yourBigFile.txt.tmp', 'w') for line in f1.readlines(): match = re.search( 'StcSystem Version=' , line ) if match : line = '<StcSystem Version="' + stc_maj_min_ver + '">\n'
match = re.search( 'TestModule Id=' , line ) if match : line = '<TestModule Id="Firmware" Version=\"' + stc_maj_min_ver + '.' + ilbuildnumber + '"' + ' CheckExactVersion="true"/>\n'
match = re.search( 'TestPackage Id="stc"' , line ) if match : line = '<TestPackage Id="stc" Version="' + stc_maj_min_ver + '.' + ilbuildnumber + '"' + ' CheckExactVersion="true"/>\n'
match = re.search( 'TestPackage Id="l2l3"' , line ) if match : line = '<TestPackage Id="l2l3" Version="' + stc_maj_min_ver + '.' + ilbuildnumber + '"' + ' CheckExactVersion="true"/>\n' f2.write(line)
f1.close() f2.close()
if os.path.exists("ILVersion.old"): sys.stdout.flush() pipe = subprocess.Popen(["cmd", "/c", "attrib", "-r", "ILVersion.old"], stdout=subprocess.PIPE) pipe.wait() attrib_output = pipe.stdout.read() print "attrib output: " + attrib_output os.remove('ILVersion.old')
os.rename(ilversion_xml_path, "ILVersion.old") os.rename("yourBigFile.txt.tmp", ilversion_xml_path) print "_run_update_ilversion_xml: complete"

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
rem devenv /build Release Framework.BLL.Gen.sln rem devenv /build Release Plugins.BLL.Gen.sln rem devenv /build Release TestCenter.Automation.Gen.sln
.\scons.cmd -j 12 -f SConstruct.bll debug=0 target=bll-win32

if %BUILD_SAVE_PDB% == true (
cd bin\Release rmdir /q /s pdb mkdir pdb copy *.pdb pdb del /q pdb\test*.pdb copy TestCenter*.pdb pdb
set P4PORT=perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 set P4USER=tableuser set P4CLIENT=%p4Client% "C:\Program Files (x86)\Debugging Tools for Windows (x86)\srcsrv\p4index.cmd" -source=%WORKSPACE% -symbols=pdb -debug
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Debugging Tools for Windows (x86)\symstore" add /f %WORKSPACE%\bin\Release\pdb\*.pdb /s \\archive.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\symbols\testcenter_ci /t SpirentTestCenter "C:\Program Files (x86)\Debugging Tools for Windows (x86)\symstore" add /f %WORKSPACE%\bin\Release\*.dll /s \\archive.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\symbols\testcenter_ci /t SpirentTestCenter REM "C:\Program Files (x86)\Debugging Tools for Windows (x86)\agestore" \\archive.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\symbols\testcenter_ci -days 20
rmdir /q /s pdb )

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import os import zipfile import urllib2 import tarfile import shutil
def _download_file_from_url(url=None): file_name = url.split('/')[-1] u = urllib2.urlopen(url) f = open(file_name, 'wb') meta = u.info() file_size = int(meta.getheaders("Content-Length")[0]) print "Downloading: %s Bytes: %s" % (file_name, file_size)
file_size_dl = 0 block_sz = 8192 while True: buffer = u.read(block_sz) if not buffer: break
file_size_dl += len(buffer) f.write(buffer) status = r"%10d [%3.2f%%]" % (file_size_dl, file_size_dl * 100. / file_size) status = status + chr(8)*(len(status)+1) print status,
f.close()
def unzip(fname,dir_name): if (fname.endswith("zip")): zip_ref = zipfile.ZipFile(fname, 'r') zip_ref.extractall(dir_name) zip_ref.close() print "Extracted in %s Directory" % dir_name else: print "Not a zip file: '%s '" % fname
def extract_tarball(fname): if ( fname.endswith("tgz") or fname.endswith("tar.gz") ): tar = tarfile.open(fname, "r:gz") tar.extractall() tar.close() elif (fname.endswith("tar")): tar = tarfile.open(fname, "r:") tar.extractall() tar.close()
zip_filename = 'orion-res.windows-386.zip' orion_res_output_dir = os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], 'bin', 'Release', 'orion-res') if os.path.exists(orion_res_output_dir): shutil.rmtree(orion_res_output_dir) # clean up previous output dir if exists unzip(zip_filename, orion_res_output_dir)
os.chdir('bin') tgz_filename = 'magellan-frontend.tgz' if os.path.exists('build'): shutil.rmtree('build') # clean up previous output dir from tgz file if exists extract_tarball(tgz_filename) shutil.move('build', os.path.join(orion_res_output_dir, 'content'))
bin_rel_dir=os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'],os.environ['BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR']) os.chdir(bin_rel_dir) archangel_web_dir = os.path.join(bin_rel_dir, 'web') if os.path.exists(archangel_web_dir): shutil.rmtree(archangel_web_dir) # clean up previous output dir if exists
for file in ['enhancedl47.exe', 'enhancedl47.yaml']: if os.path.exists(file): os.remove(file)
tar_filename = 'enhancedl47-win32.tar.gz' extract_tarball(tar_filename)
# dut-collector dut_collector_output_dir = os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], 'bin', 'Release', 'dut-collector') if os.path.exists(dut_collector_output_dir): shutil.rmtree(dut_collector_output_dir) # clean up previous output dir if exists os.chdir(os.environ['WORKSPACE']) tgz_filename = 'dut-collector.windows-386.tgz' if os.path.exists('dut-collector'): shutil.rmtree('dut-collector') # clean up previous output dir from tgz file if exists extract_tarball(tgz_filename) shutil.move('dut-collector', dut_collector_output_dir)

import shutil import os
output_filename = 'orion-res' dir_name = os.path.join(os.environ['WORKSPACE'], 'bin', 'Release', 'orion-res') if os.path.exists('orion-res.zip'): os.remove('orion-res.zip') shutil.make_archive(output_filename, 'zip', dir_name)

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion SET modified=%WORKSPACE:/=\% if "%P4CLEANWORKSPACE%" == "true" (
echo "Removing %modified%" rd /s /q %modified%\Bakeoff_TestCaseScripts rd /s /q %modified%\bin rd /s /q %modified%\build rd /s /q %modified%\common rd /s /q %modified%\content rd /s /q %modified%\framework rd /s /q %modified%\Layer1 rd /s /q %modified%\Release rd /s /q %modified%\scm rd /s /q %modified%\trafficcenter-app rd /s /q %modified%\userdocauto del /f /q %modified%\*.* echo 9R1Y9fE4$PSH|p4 -u tableuser -p perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 login p4 -u tableuser -p perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 -c jenkins-%NODE_NAME%-%JOB_NAME%-%BRANCH_NAME% sync //jenkins-%NODE_NAME%-%JOB_NAME%-%BRANCH_NAME%/...#none )
